model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: Black widow movie was awesome. We enjoy lot and had Brazilian foods.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Speaker A is a person who values family and enjoys activities like healing clients, salsa dancing, and going to Brazilian steakhouse with their brother. They are interested in healing methods such as self-massage, essential oils, reiki, meditation, and self-awareness.

Relationship Description:
Speaker B shows a level of intimacy with Speaker A by engaging in conversations about their family, activities, and interests. They express interest in trying out healing methods suggested by Speaker A and enjoy spending time on the water with their sister.

Event Description:
Events shared by Speaker A and Speaker B include going salsa dancing, dining at a Brazilian steakhouse, sailing with siblings, watching movies with family, and experiencing a heat wave. Speaker A plans on taking their clients salsa dancing soon, while Speaker B enjoys meeting different people and dancing under the stars on a boat.
